message.name: ERR_OBJECTIVE_TYPE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No objective type with ID '%1s' could be found in rule set '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_RNFE_RULE_SET
message.locale: No rule set with name '%1s' could be found.

message.name: ERR_RNFE_RULE_CLASS
message.locale: No rule class with name '%1s' could be found in rule set '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_RNFE_RULE_ATTRIBUTE
message.locale: No rule attribute with name '%1s' could be found on rule class '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_RNFE_RULE_SET_EFFECTIVE_ON_DATE
message.locale: No rule set is in effect on date %1d for product '%2c'.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_WRONG_CLASS
message.locale: Expected an instance of the rule class '%1s', but the rule object supplied ('%2s') is an instance of rule class '%3s'.

message.name: ERR_RNFE_DETERMINATION_COMPARISON_STRATEGY
message.locale: No registered strategy implementation found for case determination comparison strategy type '%1c'.

message.name: ERR_NOT_CREOLE_PRODUCT
message.locale: Product '%1c' is not a CREOLE-enabled product.

message.name: INF_DETERMINATION_CHANGED
message.locale: Processing of case with ID %1n detected a change in determination output.

message.name: INF_DETERMINATION_UNCHANGED
message.locale: Processing of case with ID %1n did not detect any change in determination output.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_DETAILS_CANNOT_BE_DISPLAYED
message.locale: Decision details cannot be displayed for this period.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_DETAILS_NOT_CONFIGURED
message.locale: No detailed information about the decision can be displayed, as no Decision Details rule set is defined for the Product over the cover period of the Decision.

message.name: ERR_CLOSED_CASE_CANNOT_BE_ASSESSED
message.locale: Eligibility cannot be determined because assessment may not occur in cases of this type that are closed.

message.name: INF_CASE_ASSESSMENT_DETERMINATION_RESULT_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Case assessment determination result for caseID '%1s'

message.name: ERR_KEY_STRUCT_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN_CASE_ID_FIELD
message.locale: Key struct '%1s' does not contain a caseID field.

message.name: ERR_RULE_SET_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Rule set with ID '%1n' not found.
